metadata.name: BPFtrace Unsafe Option Usage
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of the unsafe bpftrace option

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('bpftrace')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--unsafe')))

output.summary: Detects the usage of the unsafe bpftrace option

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of the unsafe option References: https://embracethered.com/blog/posts/2021/offensive-bpf-bpftrace/, https://bpftrace.org/
